price: Na makhazina, na vyeo vya hishima,
footnotes: Tukawatoa, kadhaalika, kwenye khazina za dhahabu na fedha, na majumba waliyo kuwa wakiyakalia, wakineemeka kwa uzuri wake na ubora wa starehe zake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
